parameters.definition: Total amount of money Mr. Roberts has for investment
Maximum amount that can be invested in telecom
Minimum ratio of investment in telecom compared to healthcare
Profit rate for the telecom investment
Profit rate for the healthcare investment

description: Mr. Roberts wants to invest in the telecom and healthcare industries. He has \param{TotalInvestment} to invest. He has decided that the amount invested in telecom be at least \param{MinTelecomRatio} times as much as the amount invested in healthcare. But the money invested in telecom must be at most \param{MaxTelecomInvestment}. If investments in telecom earn \param{ProfitTelecom} and investments in healthcare earn \param{ProfitHealthcare}, how much should Mr. Roberts invest in each to maximize profit?
